name: security-sentinel
description: Autonomous security scanning agent for VPS and web infrastructure. 90+ checks across 12 tools covering auth, TLS, headers, VPS hardening, API credentials, dependencies, SAST, secrets, email security, HTTP recon, and host hardening. SOC2, HIPAA, and PCI-DSS compliance reporting. Optional AI analysis via Ollama or Claude API.
author: tk-47
postInstall: cd into the installed directory, run 'bun install', copy .env.example to .env, fill in your values, then run 'bun run scan'. Or open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up Security Sentinel for my infrastructure"
